text: its such a great game. wild arms 1,2,3,5 are all so good 4 is alright but its to short and really lacks the wild arms feel with its layout of map and travel which 5 fixed. 3 is my personal favorite as it brought so much to the table in side/extra content. ugh so good
author: RiorXD

text: And I'm back! Funnily enough, I intended to upload a track from Wild Arms and today learned that it's been released exactly 19 years ago here in the west. This is one of my favorite tracks in one of my favorite soundtracks ever, so that's saying something. The road to #2000 begins! I can't believe we're about to reach such a number.

text: +SupraDarky Ooo happy (western) anniversary, WA!
